articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Amazon Prime Video is getting ads on January 29th - The Verge
articles.description: Amazon is going to start putting ads in Prime Video on January 29th unless you pay an extra $2.99 per month to get rid of them.
articles.content:
Reminder: Amazon Prime Video is getting ads next week
Reminder: Amazon Prime Video is getting ads next week
 / Youll have to pay an extra $2.99 per month if you want to go ad-free again.
